src:
VIDEO: So vsega krivi centimetri!? To je med prenosom v živo rekla Jana Morelj
Ne sneg, ampak ...
01 Nov 2019, 10:02 by S. U.
Radijska voditeljica in napovedovalka vremena Jana Morelj očitno včeraj ni imela najboljšega večera, saj se ji je ob ob vremenski napovedi pripetila manjša napaka. »V Višnji Gori na Dolenjskem je seks, snegs, sneg,« je dejala.Se je pa na koncu pošalila na svoj račun ter dejala, da so šli pač včeraj žurat in da so vsega krivi centimetri. Več na posnetku ...
text:
VIDEO: Centimeters are all to blame !? This is what Jana Morelj said during the live broadcast
Not snow, but ...
01 Nov 2019, 10:02 by S. U.
Jana Morelj, the radio presenter and weather forecaster, clearly did not have the best night yesterday, as a minor mistake occurred with the weather forecast. "There is sex, snegs, snow in Višnja Gora in Dolenjska," she said. But in the end, she sent it to her account, saying that they had just gone to yesterday's party and that everything was inches. More on the clip ...
